name: Left-Facing Fist
baseMeaning: A fist facing left, ready for a fist bump.
tldr: Fist bump partner (left side) or solidarity.

contextMeanings.meaning: Paired with right fist for solidarity.

platformNotes.note: Almost always paired with right fist.
Used in partnership and team content.

generationalNotes.note: Used paired with right fist for bumps.
Part of the fist bump pair.

seoTitle: Left-Facing Fist Emoji Meaning - What Does  Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the left-facing fist emoji  really means. From fist bumps to solidarity, discover all its uses.
